text: varito anu: "Dinini (i khur'an nu) ni prabhuvu vadda nundi satyanto, visvasulanu (visvasanlo) patistam ceyataniki mariyu (allah ku) sampurnanga vidheyuluga unna variki (muslinlaku) sanmargam cupataniki mariyu subhavarta andajeyataniki, parisud'dhatma (jibril) kramakramanga unnadi unnatluga tisukoni vaccadu
